content.en: Hydrological forecasting: Scientists have been studying the performance of different algorithms in predicting river flow and streamflow. They have found that long short-term memory (LSTM) networks are effective in river flow prediction and streamflow forecasting. Other deep learning models, such as convolutional LSTM (CLSTM) and stacked LSTM, have also shown promising results in predicting streamflow and rainfall. These findings can help improve our understanding and prediction of water levels in rivers and reservoirs.
content.da: Hydrologisk prognose: Forskere har studeret ydeevnen af forskellige algoritmer i at forudsige flodstrøm og vandføring. De har fundet ud af, at long short-term memory (LSTM) netværk er effektive til forudsigelse af flodstrøm og vandføringsprognoser. Andre dybe læringsmodeller, såsom convolutional LSTM (CLSTM) og stacked LSTM, har også vist lovende resultater i forudsigelse af vandføring og nedbør. Disse fund kan hjælpe med at forbedre vores forståelse og forudsigelse af vandstande i floder og reservoirer.
